review: The biggest issue I had was not being able to select Prime Music from the stick. I had to add things to my albums on another device before I could play them on the stick connected device.
author: Howard M. Brown

review: I'm a prime member and still had to pay to watch shows. Not happy about this purchase. Already returned
author: Jessica Hall

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is Chromecast 2.0. It has been the easiest streaming device that I've used to date - and I've tried them all. Never had any issues with it and I've had it since Xmas 2014. interface is slick. Streams netflix all day with no problems. The games that are available on it run buttery smooth with the included wireless remote.HIGHLY recommend to anyone that wants netflix/amazon content/music/some android games on any TV.
author: Evan Stueve

review: So far so good.  My 10 year old plugged it in set it up on her sisters TV and as far as I know it is working as expected.  No complaints.
author: SL - Avon Lake
